channel.title: SML Launch Button Crashed the Game
channel.description: SML Launch Button Crashed the Game. I can launch the Modded game with the normal icon on my desktop just not the launch button in SML (this started right after the new SML update.

item.title: SML Launch Button Crashed the Game
item.dc:creator: @LadyKathleen Lady Kathleen
item.description:
@LadyKathleen wrote:

SML Launch Button Crashed the Game.
I can launch the Modded game with the normal icon on my desktop just not the launch button in SML (this started right after the new SML update.
